posts.description: Espresso is a concentrated form of coffee brewed with high pressure, hot water and finely ground coffee beans.
posts.title: Espresso

posts.description: Double espresso is a double shot which is extracted using double the amount of ground coffee in a larger-sized portafilter basket.
posts.title: Double Espresso

posts.description: The Red Eye coffee is a classic espresso drink containing drip-brew coffee, which makes the coffee stronger.
posts.title: Red eye

posts.description: A black eye coffee is a standard cup of filter coffee with a double shot of espresso poured on top. The black eye is so named because the double espresso shot has the appearance of a black eye when it is poured into the filter coffee.
posts.title: Black eye

posts.description: An americano, combines freshly pulled shots of espresso with hot water to achieve the size of a standard cup of brewed coffee
posts.title: Americano

posts.description: A flat white is an espresso-based drink that contains steamed milk
posts.title: Flate white
